stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Your chance to attend the ultimate SRE event in London is here on September 14th-15th! With 50+ talks by industry-leading experts, you won't want to miss out. Early bird tickets are still available!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Your chance to attend the ultimate SRE event in London is here on September 14th-15th! With 50+ talks by industry-leading experts, you won't want to miss out. Early bird tickets are still available! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: From brain signals to words
stories.Description: Through the fusion of neuroscience and AI, a woman paralyzed by a stroke can now communicate again, using an avatar that speaks with her own voice.
stories.Tweet: From brain signals to words 📦 Through the fusion of neuroscience and AI, a woman paralyzed by a stroke can now communicate again, using an avatar that speaks with her own voice. #ai https://fortune.com/well/2023/08/23/new-technology-allows-paralyzed-woman-speak-again-own-voice-avatar-brain-computer-interface-electrodes-university-california-san-francisco/

stories.Title: The eyes never lie
stories.Description: A recent study suggests that 3D eye scans, coupled with AI analysis, can identify retinal changes related to Parkinson's disease long before symptoms arise.
stories.Tweet: The eyes never lie 📦 A recent study suggests that 3D eye scans, coupled with AI analysis, can identify retinal changes related to Parkinson's disease long before symptoms arise. #ai https://thenextweb.com/news/3d-eye-scans-can-detect-signs-of-parkinsons

stories.Title: Nvidia keeps ascending
stories.Description: Nvidia's journey through the AI landscape is reflected in its Q2 report. With revenues soaring to $13.51 billion, doubling from the previous year, the company's impact is undeniable.
stories.Tweet: Nvidia keeps ascending 📦 Nvidia's journey through the AI landscape is reflected in its Q2 report. With revenues soaring to $13.51 billion, doubling from the previous year, the company's impact is undeniable. #nvidia https://www.engadget.com/nvidia-records-mega-profits-thanks-to-its-ai-chip-business-084552302.html

stories.Title: Rethinking robot manipulation
stories.Description: MIT's AI "Smoothing" technique is a giant leap in robotics. By simplifying tasks and enhancing adaptability, this innovation promises cost-effective solutions across industries.
stories.Tweet: Rethinking robot manipulation 📦 MIT's AI "Smoothing" technique is a giant leap in robotics. By simplifying tasks and enhancing adaptability, this innovation promises cost-effective solutions across industries. #robotics https://news.mit.edu/2023/ai-technique-robots-manipulate-objects-whole-bodies-0824

stories.Title: What's new on Midjourney?
stories.Description: Their "vary (region)" infill feature allows you to transform specific parts of images with a few clicks, making it easier to adjust elements and achieve your desired outcome.
stories.Tweet: What's new on Midjourney? 📦 Their "vary (region)" infill feature allows you to transform specific parts of images with a few clicks, making it easier to adjust elements and achieve your desired outcome. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/midjourney-adds-new-vary-region-feature-to-rival-photoshop-generative-fill/

stories.Title: Rocket Lab: Reuse and relaunch
stories.Description: By reflying an Electron engine successfully, they're solidifying their path toward reusing the full rocket booster, opening doors to sustainable space exploration.
stories.Tweet: Rocket Lab: Reuse and relaunch 📦 By reflying an Electron engine successfully, they're solidifying their path toward reusing the full rocket booster, opening doors to sustainable space exploration. #rocketlab https://spacenews.com/rocket-lab-reuses-engine-on-electron-launch/

stories.Title: AI enters video production
stories.Description: Irreverent Labs has secured a game-changing investment from Samsung Next. The startup is currently working on an AI model that transforms prompts into stunning 3D videos.
stories.Tweet: AI enters video production 📦 Irreverent Labs has secured a game-changing investment from Samsung Next. The startup is currently working on an AI model that transforms prompts into stunning 3D videos. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/irreverent-labs-backed-by-samsung-next-set-to-revolutionize-video-content-creation-with-ai/

stories.Title: More bumps on the road for Google
stories.Description: Google and Samsung's Project Moohan, aimed at developing a mixed-reality headset, is rumored to be facing internal complexities that might impact the project's direction and timeline.
stories.Tweet: More bumps on the road for Google 📦 Google and Samsung's Project Moohan, aimed at developing a mixed-reality headset, is rumored to be facing internal complexities that might impact the project's direction and timeline. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/23/23843308/google-samsung-ar-mixed-reality-headsets

stories.Title: Is this it?
stories.Description: Elon Musk has revealed the Cybertruck production candidate. With the finishing touches in place, we might just be witnessing Tesla's "best product ever."
stories.Tweet: Is this it? 📦 Elon Musk has revealed the Cybertruck production candidate. With the finishing touches in place, we might just be witnessing Tesla's "best product ever." #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/08/23/elon-musk-teases-tesla-cybertruck-production-candidate/

stories.Title: Do you know a song that goes like… hmm
stories.Description: YouTube is testing out an experiment for Android users that allows song identification through humming or recording. A move that sets it apart from traditional music recognition apps.
stories.Tweet: Do you know a song that goes like… hmm 📦 YouTube is testing out an experiment for Android users that allows song identification through humming or recording. A move that sets it apart from traditional music recognition apps. #youtube https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/23/youtube-tests-search-feature-users-hum-sing-identify-songs/

title: Nvidia's AI reign continues, Meet: Irreverent Labs, Midjourney's latest feature
description: The numbers speak for themselves; there's no doubt that Nvidia stands as the leading contender on the AI battlefield. Irreverent Labs is a small startup that has caught Samsung’s attention, and if you’re into video production you should check it out too. Lastly, Midjourney's new "vary (region)" feature is a lifesaver, especially for someone like me, dealing with prompt results that include unusual-looking hands.
